entry.source: This is Hope.{F801}We have gained information from a fellow who was investigating nearby that a Sabbath was taking place in the depths of the forest.{F801}There may be survivors of those who were participating in the Sabbath.{F801}{F804,5}Search inside the forest{F804,0} and ensure the safety of the survivors.{F801}That is all.{F801}
